title: n00dTraits
description: Elevate gameplay with traits that grow, adapt, and interact, bringing your game’s characters or actors to life with nuanced precision and endless possibilities.
longDescription:
n00dTraits: Comprehensive Traits System for Dynamic Character Development


Demonstration 📹

Getting Started📹

Create a Trait📹

Setup UI 📹


Elevate your game’s character (or actor) development with n00dTraits, a powerful and flexible plugin designed to manage attributes, statistics, and their intricate interactions. Fully network-replicated and driven by primary data assets, n00dTraits provides a streamlined solution for both single-player and multiplayer environments.


Key Features:


  • Attributes and Statistics: Define and manage key character traits like health, stamina, and intelligence through easily customizable data assets.
  • Multiplayer-Ready: Ensure consistent trait values across all players with reliable network replication.
  • Server-Client Synchronization: Maintain accurate trait data synchronization between server and client, avoiding gameplay inconsistencies.
  • Not limited to characters: Use this component across anything in your project that you want to have traits, it supports all actors
  • Primary Data Assets: Traits are managed through modular data assets, allowing for straightforward expansion and customization without altering the base system.
  • Effortless Integration: Compatible with other n00d plugins, providing a cohesive and unified experience across your project’s systems.
  • Ready-to-Use Assets: Includes a comprehensive set of example assets and blueprints to demonstrate implementation and customization of traits.
  • UI Elements: Comes with example UI elements to help you quickly integrate trait displays and interactions into your game’s interface.
  • Experience and Leveling: Integrated support for XP and leveling systems, allowing traits to evolve with progression.
  • Blueprint Support: Full support for blueprint scripting to facilitate easy integration and customization of trait logic.
  • Event Dispatchers: Utilize built-in functions and event dispatchers to modify and respond to trait changes dynamically.


Example Assets Include:

  • Attributes: Constitution, Intelligence, Strength, etc.
  • Statistics: Health, Mana, Experience, etc.
  • Blueprint Classes: Character, DamageVolume, Pickup, etc.
  • Widget Blueprints: UI elements for displaying and managing traits.


n00dTraits empowers your game development with a robust framework for managing character traits, offering a balance of flexibility and functionality. Its data-driven approach and comprehensive replication make it an essential tool for creating engaging and dynamic character systems. Couple n00dTraits with n00dBuffs to create dynamic gameplay experiences with minimal effort!


As part of the n00dWorkshop suite

n00dTraits integrates seamlessly with other n00d assets, enhancing development consistency and streamlining your workflow. Elevate your characters with n00dTraits—where every trait contributes to a richer gameplay experience.

technicalDetails:
YOU DO NOT NEED TO KNOW C++ TO USE THIS PLUGIN! ALL N00D PLUGINS ARE BLUEPRINT-FIRST, C++ WHERE REQUIRED!



Code Modules:

  • Runtime

 

Number of Blueprints: 5 (excluding examples)

Number of C++ Classes: 1 (Project Settings)

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux
